# Code of Conduct

## Our Pledge

We are committed to providing a welcoming and inclusive environment for all contributors, regardless of experience level, background, or identity.

## Standards

Expected behavior:
- Use respectful and inclusive language
- Accept constructive feedback gracefully
- Focus on what is best for the community
- Show empathy toward other contributors

Unacceptable behavior:
- Harassment, trolling, or insulting comments
- Personal or political attacks
- Publishing others' private information without permission
- Any conduct that could reasonably be considered inappropriate

## Enforcement

Instances of unacceptable behavior may be reported to the project maintainers. All complaints will be reviewed and investigated promptly and fairly.

Project maintainers have the right to remove, edit, or reject comments, commits, code, issues, and other contributions that do not align with this Code of Conduct.

## Scope

This Code of Conduct applies within all project spaces and when an individual is representing the project in public spaces.
